Trade/Device Name(s): BD Vacutainer® Push Button Blood Collection Set
BD Vacutainer® Push Button Blood Collection Set with Pre-Attached Holder
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for BD Vacutainer Push Button Blood Collection Set and Push Button Blood Collection Set with Pre-Attached Holder for venipuncture and short-term infusion.
Indications for Use Summary: Sterile, multi-sample, single-use winged blood collection set for healthcare professionals to obtain blood specimens, including from patients with difficult vein access, into evacuated tubes, blood culture bottles, or syringe; also usable for short-term, single infusions under clinician supervision.
